TopicTitle: From the Earth to the Mun(Budgeting my fail!)

Articles.Content:
The goal: Land on the Mun. Make it back alive. Beat the Koviets from placing their evil flag on the Mun!

A little experiment for me, I'm going to give myself a budget and cost calculate each mission, I will give myself a budget for every ?mission and it will rise or fall based on the amount of fail/success. To gauge this I will be ripping off 'Race into Space' the old dos game for the success value for various missions.

*I'm sure this has been done before, and will be done again. This is purely for my own entertainment and for anyone who wants to help me get to the Mun!

Some notes for me:

Budget: [To be decided]

Rules:

-Kerbalnaut families get $1000 for every death for compensation.

-Test missions are cost calculated too.

-Budget will increase/decrease by 10%/20/40 based on performance of missions.

-If someone gives me a full idea in this thread for a component(landing stage maybe) I must pay double the cost to add it to my rocket(To purchase the part).

-Satellite missions are using the 1 crew command module, it is assumed that it is empty! The 'prestige value' of unmanned missions is correspondingly lowered.

*Additional ideas welcome!

Current components to be worked on:

-Orbital Satellite

-Suborbital capable rocket

-Budget price!
